snippet: Mayor Steven Fulop’s proposal would require all but the smallest businesses to provide workers with five paid sick days a year.
abstract: Jersey City Mayor Steven Fulop wants to require all but the smallest businesses to provide employees paid sick days; bill would make city, New Jersey’s second largest, first in state and one of the few nationwide to require paid sick leave.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Steven Fulop’s proposal would require all but the smallest businesses to provide workers with five paid sick days a year.

headline.main: Jersey City May Require Paid Sick Leave
headline.print_headline: Jersey City May Require Sick Leave
